about_the_game:
Kindred Spirits on the Roof - Original Soundtrack

Features all the game tracks, including the full vocal songs!


01. Girl's Spirit - Otome no Kimochi - (3:40)
02. Girl's Spirit - Otome no Kimochi - Instrumental (3:38)
03. Shirojo (2:43)
04. My Territory (3:06)
05. Sweet Words, Sweet Hearts (3:24)
06. Classroom March (3:31)
07. ClashingXSwords (3:41)
08. Milestone (3:57)
09. Kindred Spirits (3:28)
10. Together (4:04)
11. Paused in Midsummer (2:46)
12. Just do it! (3:29)
13. A. A. Ai! (5:33)
14. A New Day (4:07)
15. A New Day - Instrumental(4:07)

The OST is also included in the Drama CD vol.4 package.
